questions.question: What is the 'Kakori Conspiracy'?
questions.answer: The looting of a government treasury on a train near Kakori railway station in 1925.

questions.answer: Ashfaqulla Khan, Ram Prasad Bismil, Roshan Singh, Rajendra Lahiri.

questions.answer: At Feroz Shah Kotla ground in Delhi in 1928.

questions.answer: Chandrashekhar Azad, Bhagat Singh, Rajguru, Sukhdev.
